divs: sighting detailsi was at the computer, and my friend said they saw something in the sky, so iwent out and looked. i saw 2 moving lights flying around the direction of themoon. and a few min later online he said he saw a bigger one north\ oppositeside of the horizon from the moon. i went out and it was bigger then any otherstar out there. and u could see it moving and bouncing about. it is still outthere right now. u can see it in relation to stars next to it.. it does theseloops and zig zag things.. it has a big aura around it. and had many weirdlights glowing on the outside of it. my friend says that he sees these all thetime and he is not the only one. its hard for me to believe it is one but u gotasee it. these people say it is seen mostly about 1-230 am. it is staying in thesame general area. that is why its hard to believe its something other then asatelite or something.
Summary: sparkly blinking sphere bouncing and spiraling
trends: There has been one other sighting in Tehachapi
There were no other sightings in Tehachapi on or around
